pullrequest.title: Move physics::Inertial to ignition math, add MassMatrix3 subclass

content.raw:
`physics::Inertial` has several mathematical operations that I would like to move to `ignition::math`:

* `math::Matrix3 Inertial::GetMOI(const math::Pose &_pose)`
* `Inertial Inertial::operator+(const Inertial &_inertial) const`
* `void Inertial::Rotate(const math::Quaternion &_rot)`

I would retain the `physics::Inertial` class to handle the sdf and message interfaces, but I thought it would be more broadly useful to have the mathematical operations in ignition than in `gazebo::physics`
